LDV BX,0000000000000000
CMP BX,0000000000000000
JE 1111111111111010
CMP BX,0000000000000001
JE 0000000000000110
CALL 0000000000001001
JMP 1111111111101011
CALL 0000000000001101
JMP 1111111111100101
IN
DIV 0000000000010001
MOV AX,DX
OUT
RET
LDV CX,1111111111111111
LOOP 1111111111111101
INC AX
OUT
CMP AX,0000000011111111
JNE 1111111111110001
RET
LDV BX,0000000000000001
IRET
LDV BX,0000000000000010
IRET
